mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipes_maker.RECIPE ( title, description ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{description} ) RETURNING recipe_id as recipe_id
mapper.select: SELECT R.recipe_id, R.title, R.description, R.created_at, R.updated_at, I.ingredient_id, I.name as ingredient_name, I.quantity FROM recipes_maker.recipe R LEFT JOIN recipes_maker.ingredients I ON R.recipe_id = I.recipe_id ORDER BY R.updated_at DESC, R.recipe_id, I.ingredient_id;
